com.javagameengine.assets.sounds

Class SoundBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.javagameengine.assets.NativeObject
      • com.javagameengine.assets.sounds.SoundBuffer

  • public class SoundBuffer
extends NativeObject
    SoundBuffer is a native buffer stored on the audio hardware through OpenAL. It contains the sound data in a Java NIO buffer and a pointer to the location on the audio hardware. Additionally, it provides static methods to load .wav files.
